question: India has successfully carried out a fresh user trial of Agni-II ballistic missile in ______.
explanation: The Agni-ll Ballistic Missile was successfully test fired at A.P.J Abdul Kalam island of Dhamara in Odisha by the personnel of the Strategic Forces Command of the Indian Army. The missile reportedly achieved its full range and splashed down at the pre-designated target in the sea with high degree of accuracy.
